20110127030007.000|20110127030009.000|TR0|ANDERSON COOPER, CNN ANCHOR:  Tonight on 
20110127030009.000|20110127030011.000|TR0|360, "Keeping Them Honest": a coin company 
20110127030011.000|20110127030013.000|TR0|profiting off 9/11.  Are their 
20110127030013.000|20110127030015.000|TR0|commemorative coins a scam?  The company 
20110127030015.000|20110127030017.000|TR0|is being accused of making false claims 
20110127030017.000|20110127030019.000|TR0|about what is in the coins.  In 
20110127030019.000|20110127030021.000|TR0|particular, they say they use silver from 
20110127030021.000|20110127030023.000|TR0|Ground Zero.  Do they have proof?  We're 
20110127030023.000|20110127030025.000|TR0|"Keeping Them Honest."
20110127030025.000|20110127030028.000|TR0|
20110127030028.000|20110127030030.000|TR0|Also, controversy over a Bible-themed 
20110127030030.000|20110127030032.000|TR0|amusement park.  They plan to build a 
20110127030032.000|20110127030034.000|TR0|full-sized Noah's Ark with dinosaurs and 
20110127030034.000|20110127030036.000|TR0|unicorns.  The state of Kentucky is giving 
20110127030036.000|20110127030038.000|TR0|them tax incentives.  Should they?  It's 
20110127030038.000|20110127030040.000|TR0|an emotional and fiery debate you will see 
20110127030040.000|20110127030042.000|TR0|tonight.

20110127030044.000|20110127030047.000|TR0|And a battle over bullying: a teacher in 
20110127030047.000|20110127030049.000|TR0|trouble for calling cops on a 7-year-old 
20110127030049.000|20110127030051.000|TR0|she said was bullying and threatening 
20110127030051.000|20110127030053.000|TR0|other students.  Did she go too far?  Dr. 
20110127030053.000|20110127030055.000|TR0|Phil weighs in.
20110127030055.000|20110127030057.000|TR0|
20110127030057.000|20110127030059.000|TR0|We begin, though, as always, "Keeping Them 
20110127030059.000|20110127030101.000|TR0|Honest" with a company profiting off the 
20110127030101.000|20110127030103.000|TR0|horror of 9/11, and doing it in a way that 
20110127030103.000|20110127030106.000|TR0|some lawmakers and survivors say is false 
20110127030106.000|20110127030108.000|TR0|and abhorrent.
20110127030108.000|20110127030110.000|TR0|
20110127030110.000|20110127030112.000|TR0|Now, maybe you have seen the ads or looked 
20110127030112.000|20110127030114.000|TR0|at the Web site.  Here it is.  It's called 
20110127030114.000|20110127030116.000|TR0|the National Collector's Mint.  They're 
20110127030116.000|20110127030118.000|TR0|selling coins -- here's one of them -- 
20110127030118.000|20110127030120.000|TR0|billed as the -- the official first- 
20110127030120.000|20110127030122.000|TR0|responders 10th anniversary World Trade 
20110127030122.000|20110127030125.000|TR0|Center commemorative.
20110127030125.000|20110127030127.000|TR0|
20110127030127.000|20110127030129.000|TR0|They say it's clad in .999 pure silver 
20110127030129.000|20110127030131.000|TR0|which they claim was actually recovered 
20110127030131.000|20110127030133.000|TR0|from Ground Zero.  "From the vaults 
20110127030133.000|20110127030135.000|TR0|beneath the ashes of Ground Zero" is the 
20110127030135.000|20110127030137.000|TR0|exact wording.  They sell these coins for 
20110127030137.000|20110127030139.000|TR0|$29.95 and the company bills them as never 
20110127030139.000|20110127030141.000|TR0|released for circulation, available only 
20110127030141.000|20110127030144.000|TR0|to collectors.
20110127030144.000|20110127030146.000|TR0|
20110127030146.000|20110127030148.000|TR0|Now, you might have already heard that the 
20110127030148.000|20110127030150.000|TR0|9/11 Memorial Museum is issuing coins to 
20110127030150.000|20110127030152.000|TR0|help finance the memorial, so you night 
20110127030152.000|20110127030154.000|TR0|think these are those coins.  After all, 
20110127030154.000|20110127030156.000|TR0|it does says National Collector's Mint and

20110127030331.000|20110127030333.000|TR0|

20110127030335.000|20110127030337.000|TR0|from the earlier sales pitch.  The same is 
20110127030337.000|20110127030340.000|TR0|true of the Web ads, that gold and silver, 
20110127030340.000|20110127030342.000|TR0|14 milligrams each.  It sounds precise, 
20110127030342.000|20110127030344.000|TR0|sounds scientific, but what is a 
20110127030344.000|20110127030346.000|TR0|milligram?  Well, it's one thousandth of a 
20110127030346.000|20110127030348.000|TR0|gram.  So, that's about 
20110127030348.000|20110127030350.000|TR0|fourteen-thousandth of a gram of gold and 
20110127030350.000|20110127030352.000|TR0|silver.
20110127030352.000|20110127030354.000|TR0|
20110127030354.000|20110127030356.000|TR0|And what about the claim about the silver 
20110127030356.000|20110127030359.000|TR0|coming from the Ground Zero vaults?  It 
20110127030359.000|20110127030401.000|TR0|certainly sounds dramatic and moving.  
20110127030401.000|20110127030403.000|TR0|Well, two U.S. lawmakers from New York, 
20110127030403.000|20110127030405.000|TR0|one of whom you're about to meet, say 
20110127030405.000|20110127030407.000|TR0|there's absolutely no evidence for that

20110127030409.000|20110127030411.000|TR0|

20110127030413.000|20110127030415.000|TR0|evidence.  They say they have it.  They 
20110127030415.000|20110127030418.000|TR0|haven't shown it to us or to anyone else 
20110127030418.000|20110127030420.000|TR0|that we can find.  And what about the 
20110127030420.000|20110127030422.000|TR0|official sounding National Collector's 
20110127030422.000|20110127030424.000|TR0|Mint? Well, it turns out it gets an F. 
20110127030424.000|20110127030426.000|TR0|from the Better Business Bureau, a failing 
20110127030426.000|20110127030428.000|TR0|grade, citing numerous complaints and 
20110127030428.000|20110127030430.000|TR0|failures to respond to even simple 
20110127030430.000|20110127030432.000|TR0|requests for information from the Better 
20110127030432.000|20110127030434.000|TR0|Business Bureau.
20110127030434.000|20110127030437.000|TR0|
20110127030437.000|20110127030439.000|TR0|It's also a company with a history.  Six 
20110127030439.000|20110127030441.000|TR0|years ago, the National Collector's Mint 
20110127030441.000|20110127030443.000|TR0|paid out millions in refunds over ads for 
20110127030443.000|20110127030445.000|TR0|something called a Freedom Tower silver 
20110127030445.000|20110127030447.000|TR0|dollar.  So, clearly, this is not their 
20110127030447.000|20110127030449.000|TR0|first attempt to profit off 9/11.
20110127030449.000|20110127030451.000|TR0|
20110127030451.000|20110127030453.000|TR0|Now, in a statement, the company said it's

20110127030500.000|20110127030502.000|TR0|deceptive and is clearly presented."
20110127030502.000|20110127030504.000|TR0|
20110127030504.000|20110127030506.000|TR0|They also say the company has donated more 
20110127030506.000|20110127030508.000|TR0|than $2 million in sales from all of its

20110127030514.000|20110127030517.000|TR0|a lot of money.
20110127030517.000|20110127030519.000|TR0|

20110127030818.000|20110127030820.000|TR0|make of this?  I mean, you were one of the

20110127030831.000|20110127030833.000|TR0|TOM DEPRISCO, FORMER NEW YORK POLICE 
20110127030833.000|20110127030835.000|TR0|DEPARTMENT CAPTAIN:  Yes, Mr. Cooper.  
20110127030835.000|20110127030837.000|TR0|Thank you very much for having me on the 
20110127030837.000|20110127030839.000|TR0|program.
20110127030839.000|20110127030841.000|TR0|
20110127030841.000|20110127030843.000|TR0|Good evening, Congressman Nadler.
20110127030843.000|20110127030845.000|TR0|
20110127030845.000|20110127030848.000|TR0|NADLER:  Good evening.
20110127030848.000|20110127030850.000|TR0|
20110127030850.000|20110127030852.000|TR0|DEPRISCO:  Back in October of 2001, we 
20110127030852.000|20110127030854.000|TR0|were well aware of the location of this 
20110127030854.000|20110127030856.000|TR0|vault that was owned and managed by the 
20110127030856.000|20110127030858.000|TR0|Bank of Nova Scotia underneath Four World 
20110127030858.000|20110127030900.000|TR0|Trade Center.
20110127030900.000|20110127030902.000|TR0|
20110127030902.000|20110127030904.000|TR0|What part of my job was, as a 
20110127030904.000|20110127030907.000|TR0|representative of the Office of Emergency 
20110127030907.000|20110127030909.000|TR0|Management, was to coordinate a retrieval 
20110127030909.000|20110127030911.000|TR0|and recovery plan to remove all the 
20110127030911.000|20110127030913.000|TR0|contents of that vault, to move it from 
20110127030913.000|20110127030915.000|TR0|the Ground Zero area over to another 
20110127030915.000|20110127030917.000|TR0|location, which at that time was another 
20110127030917.000|20110127030919.000|TR0|vault in Brooklyn.
20110127030919.000|20110127030921.000|TR0|
20110127030921.000|20110127030923.000|TR0|COOPER:  So, what about these ads make you 
20110127030923.000|20110127030926.000|TR0|so angry?
20110127030926.000|20110127030928.000|TR0|
20110127030928.000|20110127030930.000|TR0|(CROSSTALK)
20110127030930.000|20110127030932.000|TR0|
20110127030932.000|20110127030934.000|TR0|DEPRISCO:  Well, you know, I lost friends 
20110127030934.000|20110127030936.000|TR0|and colleagues on 9/11.  I worked down at 
20110127030936.000|20110127030938.000|TR0|Ground Zero for 14 months.  I was heavily 
20110127030938.000|20110127030940.000|TR0|involved with much of the recovery 
20110127030940.000|20110127030942.000|TR0|operations.  I worked with a great team of 
20110127030942.000|20110127030945.000|TR0|people with OEM and other city agencies.
20110127030945.000|20110127030947.000|TR0|
20110127030947.000|20110127030949.000|TR0|And just to -- to hear -- I have heard 
20110127030949.000|20110127030951.000|TR0|these ads for years, and it's always 
20110127030951.000|20110127030953.000|TR0|bothered me, but I always figured, what

20110127033921.000|20110127033923.000|TR0|for doing the right thing, or did she act 
20110127033923.000|20110127033925.000|TR0|in haste and violate a child's right to 
20110127033925.000|20110127033927.000|TR0|privacy?  State guidelines require that a 
20110127033927.000|20110127033929.000|TR0|teacher, quote, "notify the parents of 
20110127033929.000|20110127033931.000|TR0|both the target and bully and attempt
